data.lyric:
[ti:You Mean Everything To Me 你的意义]
[ar:侯明昊]
[al:You Mean Everything To Me 你的意义]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Mean Everything To Me 你的意义 - 侯明昊
[00:00.99]词：Afshin Salmani/Josh Cumbee/Nick Howard/侯明昊 NEO Hooo
[00:01.98]曲：Afshin Salmani/Josh Cumbee/Nick Howard
[00:02.98]编曲：T Apte
[00:03.97]制作人：T Apte
[00:04.97]混音：T Apte
[00:05.96]监唱：陈翰文 Hywell Chen
[00:06.95]录音：刘天鸿 Liu Tianhong
[00:07.95]合音：Nick Howard
[00:08.94]I know your world
[00:10.61]Has been a little unsteady
[00:12.10]
[00:13.11]You've been shaken and hurt
[00:14.81]
[00:15.35]And you need some solid ground
[00:17.40]
[00:18.07]For what it's worth
[00:19.43]
[00:20.02]When you feel your soul is heavy
[00:21.87]
[00:22.39]Darling you're my elevator
[00:24.20]
[00:24.75]Still lift me up when I need ya
[00:26.48]
[00:27.03]You're my melody my desert rose my dancing queen
[00:30.92]
[00:36.02]You're my melody
[00:37.39]The only song I wanna sing
[00:39.96]
[00:43.40]You mean everything to me
[00:45.36]

[00:53.97]

[01:03.95]
